skills.skill: APQP, PPAP, Control Plan, MEF, MSA, SPC
IATF 16949, VDA 6.3, GD&T ASME Y 14.5 M-1994
Knowledge of Carpets and Plastics Assembly Process

duties_responsibilities.duty: Participate actively in department meetings and follow up on department KPIs
Ensure proper reporting and use of Antolin Apps for monthly reports
Design, develop, and implement proper quality control guidelines
Actively participate in Product/Process audit and lead problem resolution activities
Train and mentor quality personnel and calibrate, validate, and maintain records of tools and checking fixtures

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Engineering or related field (Master’s preferred)
